price: agar Allah memberi pahala kepada orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal saleh dari karunia-Nya. Sesungguhnya Dia tidak menyukai orang-orang yang ingkar.
arabic: لِيَجۡزِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: liyajziya alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti min faḍlihi innahu lā yuḥibbu al-kāfirīna
